pageContext.title: Venomous
pageContext.content: With their debut album Preserved Emergencies tucked safely under their belts and a second already in the works Pennsylvanian band Venomous should be by today’s standards and by all means a lot more then just the talk of their small local home town of West Chester. Psych-tinged garage-punk synth-laden soliloquies visceral burners bucolic wishes all realized through Preserved Emergencies. More more more… They’re listed as one of 2007’s ‘Bands to Know’ in THE MAGAZINE.
